Judul: THE IMPACT OF BRAND KNOWLEDGE OF CELEBRITY ENDORSER AND PRODUCT TO BRAND KNOWLEDGE TRANSFER
Abstrak: X is one of the largest mobile providers in Indonesia and has been operating since 1989, with several changing of name. In the past few years, X introduced their product as the lowest tariff among the other providers. In 2007, LM signed contract with X as their celebrity endorser. LM is a model and artist. The aim of this research is to measure the brand knowledge of each entity and the brand knowledge transfer that occurred between those two entities. There are 6 hypotheses that stated in the beginning of research and to prove the hypotheses, 400 questionnaires are distributed to X users in Bandung, for people in 17- 40-year-old age range.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Ir. Evo S Hariandja, MM.
Kata Kunci: brand knowledge, transfer, celebrity endorser, path analysis
